PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TubeBundleTypeFinned
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Finned tube bundle type attributes. Contains the attributes related to the fins attached to a tube in a finned tube bundle such as is commonly found in coils.

PropertyDef.Name: Spacing
PropertyDef.Definition: Distance between fins on a tube in the tube bundle.

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalConductivity
PropertyDef.Definition: The thermal conductivity of the fin.

PropertyDef.Name: Length
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of the fin as measured parallel to the direction of airflow.

PropertyDef.Name: Height
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of the fin as measured perpendicular to the direction of airflow.

PropertyDef.Name: Diameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Actual diameter of a fin for circular fins only.

PropertyDef.Name: Material
PropertyDef.Definition: Material used for construction of the fins.

PropertyDef.Name: FinCorrugatedType
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of a fin corrugated type.

PropertyDef.Name: HasCoating
PropertyDef.Definition: TRUE if the fin has a coating, FALSE if it does not.
